testcase.name: Validating BookHotelPage details with map Interfacescenario
testcase.system-out: Given user2 is already in LoginPage.........................................passed When The title2 of the loginPage is Adactin Hotels..........................passed Then the user2 is entering the username and password........................passed And the user2 is hitting the login button...................................passed Then user2 is navigated to HomePage.........................................passed And user2 entering Location,Hotels,Room Type,NoOfRooms, CheckInDate, CheckOutDate,NoOfAdults,NoOfChildren details.passed And user2 is hitting the search button......................................passed Then the user2 is navigated to SelectHotelPage..............................passed And user2 selected the hotel and clicked on continue button.................passed Then user2 is navigated to BookAHotelPage...................................passed And user2 enters information for hotel Booking..............................passed And clicked on Book Now.....................................................passed Then user2 got navigated to ConfirmationPage................................passed Then user2 clicked on the Logout............................................passed Then user2 closed the browser...............................................passed
